description:
Keep your feet dry and comfortable by taking good care of your footwear. This kit includes everything you need to clean and waterproof your boots or shoes.

  • Wooden-handled boot brush has tough bristles to remove dried-on dirt. Pointed end is great for cleaning treads
  • Spray-on Footwear + Gear Cleaner removes dirt and neutralizes odours
  • Footwear Repel spray adds waterproofing without compromising breathability
  • Odour Eliminator removes lingering smells from the source
  • Footwear + Gear Cleaner and Footwear Repel spray are safe for use on all types of footwear including leather, suede, nubuck and fabric
  • PFAS-free formula
  • 100% recycled container is made from post-consumer plastic and ocean plastic
  • Bluesign® approved product
name: Grangers Footwear Care Kit
